mapper.insert: insert into review(id, user_id, product_id, product_order_id, score, contents) values(review_seq_id.nextval, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{orderId}, #{score}, #{contents})
mapper.select: select r.*, p.thumbnail from review r join product p on r.product_id = p.id where r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE product_order_id = #{orderId}
